prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon with a unique green color scheme and three floating arms.
Design a whimsical Pokemon that embodies intelligence and has a jelly-like structure.
Imagine a creature that uses psychic abilities to manipulate its surroundings, with a soft green body.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a brain and has a playful yet mysterious personality.
Generate a quirky Pokemon with a round body and an eye-catching color palette, perfect for battle.
Make a Pokemon that looks like it came from a dream, featuring gentle curves and bright colors.
Give me a Pokemon that floats gracefully and has an aura of mystery, with important psychic powers.

distinctive_features: Facial features resembling a face with eyes
